item.description:
We are going to see Harry on the "BIG" screen. The movie opens in Imax on July 29th, but tickets are already on sale. Get your tickets early, before they are sold out!!

We will be seeing the 8 pm show. Due to the high demand we will meet at 7 pm next to the concession stand, so that we can get good seats.

We will be going to the Reading location, make sure you get tickets for the correct place. ;-)

Hope to see you all at the movies!!


http://www.jordansima...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a TFS sign.
item.name: Harry Potter in Imax
